... Execution.

miranda is a very awesome character to me... she is so kuuru and my favorite character from black souls.

Described as battle-crazed and non-expressive. Miranda often speaks with few words, sometimes uttering only a single word. She respects strength as a result of her upbringing and only likes strong people. Unlike other members of the Black Trial, she holds no loyalty to it as she understands she is just a tool to Baphomet. As such, she immediately abandons the Black Trial for Grimm if he proves victorious over her, believing losers should follow the winner's wishes. Despite her dogmatic view, she seemingly desires to be loved. In Black Souls II, Hein describes her as having become "much more human." While still believing in strength, she is more caring of her friends, and preaches to Jabberwock the importance of giving love.
